title: Where Is Vladimir Putin?
teaser: The Russian president hasn't been seen in public since March 5, leading to speculation that he's sick.
contentencoded:
The Russian president hasn’t been seen in public since March 5, leading to speculation that he’s sick. But a Kremlin spokesman says Vladimir Putin’s health is “really perfect.”

Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson discusses this with Steven Pifer, the former U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine, who is now director of the Arms Control and Non-Proliferation Initiative at the Brookings Institution.

Guest

  • Steven Pifer, former U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine. He’s director of the Arms Control and Non-Proliferation Initiative at the Brookings Institution, as well as a senior fellow with the Center for 21st Century Security and Intelligence and the Center on the United States and Europe at Brookings. He tweets @steven_pifer.
